last_episode_to_air.name: A Resisting Girl
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sakura and Mary brace themselves for the final game. In desperation, Mary asks her friends for help, using whatever means necessary to win.

name: Kakegurui Twin
overview: Determined to climb up the social ladder, Mary Saotome invests everything she has into what her elite high school values most: high stakes gambling.

episodes.name: A Girl Named Mary Saotome
episodes.overview: Lacking in gambling skills, Tsuzura Hanatemari finds herself at the bottom of the food chain — until one day, an old friend transfers to the academy.

episodes.name: A Targeted Girl
episodes.overview: Student Council member Sakura Miharutaki faces off against a gamble crazed, unruly student. Mary’s scheme backfires when an unexpected guest shows up.

episodes.name: A Traitorous Girl
episodes.overview: On the brink of becoming a house pet, Mary must find a way to earn money. Trust is on the line when she and her friends attend a “coupling party.”

episodes.name: Confessing Girls
episodes.overview: With a traitor in their midst, Mary struggles with trusting her friends. Meanwhile, the opposing boys' team argues over whether to rejoin the game.

episodes.name: An Honest Girl
episodes.overview: Aoi attempts to lure Mary into his Full-Bloom society. Joining forces with Mikura, Sakura plots to undermine Mary through a gambling match.

episodes.name: A Resisting Girl
episodes.overview: Sakura and Mary brace themselves for the final game. In desperation, Mary asks her friends for help, using whatever means necessary to win.
